May 16, 2015 (Version 0.5)

-Various bug fixes

data.description:
****NEW UPDATES*** (5/21/2015)

Living The Dream is your second (better) life. Start off by getting a job to pull in some bacon.  After earning mucho bacon, you can go to school, blow it on a new house, or simply cherish it because it's more money than what's in your real life bank account.

Jokes aside, this is a very early release so don't expect too much yet. I currently have a whole list of updates and features I'll be adding to the game over the next couple weeks. Here's an incomplete list of confirmed upcoming new features:
-View House: Will allow you to view the outside of your house.
-Real Estate: Rent/Buy better apartments/houses.
-Store: Will allow you to buy various things to interact with inside your house.

Here is a list of unconfirmed (unconfirmed because I'm lazy and these would take a lot of coding) updates:
-Stock Market/Investments: Make money while your player sleeps.
-Walking work: Earn money and/or increase max energy for walking and exercising in your real life.
-Avatar: A unique customizable avatar for every player.

If you have any suggestions or ideas feel free to email me.

Thanks!

Changelog:

5/21/2015 (version 1.1)

    -Lowered High School credits
